overview: M.Tech-Computer Science & Engineering
uploads/course/65eaa8f8316461709877496.webp

An Autonomous Institute Noida Institute of Engineering & Technology offers the PG Course M. Tech (CSE) for students with a B. Tech degree in Computer Science and Engineering /Computer Science/ Information Technology and related branches. As a leading M.Tech in Computer Science colleges, the course is offered by the Department of Computer Science & Engineering by highly qualified and experienced faculty members. The intake of this course is 24. The course offers core courses such as Advanced Data Structures and Algorithms, Artificial Intelligence, Research Process and Methodology, High Performance Computing, Robotic Process Automation with seminar, pre-dissertation and dissertation. Among the top MTech colleges in Greater Noida, the curriculum is based on the needs of the industry. However, at our institution, we provide additional resources to bridge the gap between the academia and the industry. The objectives of this program are to build a technological base in computer science and engineering technologies, to analyze, design, develop and evaluate high-end computer systems, as well as to carry out challenging projects and carry out research activities. It also leads to identifying new trends and evaluating new technologies and working with faculty in different research fields on specialized and specific domains.

UPCET Counseling Direct Admission Year 1 Eligibility For Admission Through Upcet Counselling For admission to the first year of B. Tech: The candidate must have passed the intermediate examination of U.P. Board or 10+2 level examination from any recognized board/university; Securing minimum 45% (40% for SC/ST) marks in total of required subject combination (two compulsory & one optional subject). This admission test is open only for candidates who have passed the qualifying examination from any institution located in U.P and the parents, father/mother of the students must be domiciles of U.P. For admission to the first year of B. Tech: The candidate must have passed three years of Diploma in Engineering course securing a minimum 60% marks in aggregate and minimum 40% (35% for SC / ST) marks in mathematics. career: PEO1: Have successful careers in the field of Computer Science and pursue higher education. PEO2: Engage in research and provide innovative solutions to real-world problems of society with ethical responsibilities. overview: uploads/course/65eab26a292351709879914.webp

A Master of Technology (M.Tech) in Mechanical Engineering is a postgraduate program offering a comprehensive study of advanced mechanical engineering principles and applications. The curriculum typically dedicated towards Industry 4.0, covering fundamental topics like materials science, alongside specialization tracks in areas such as manufacturing engineering, robotics, or renewable energy. Elective courses allow students to tailor their studies to their interests, while a significant research component, including thesis or dissertation work, provides hands-on experience and fosters innovation. Practical training, lab work, seminars, and workshops supplement theoretical learning, cultivating essential soft skills like communication and project management. Graduates emerge well-prepared for careers in industry, research, academia, or entrepreneurship, equipped with a deep understanding of mechanical engineering and practical skills to tackle complex engineering challenges. Honours Degree Using MOOCs Platform Coursera/Infosys Springboard Industry Certifications

overview: Masters Business Administration (International Twinning Program)
international-twinning-program#mba

NIET offers an AICTE approved International Twinning program for the students. The program is based on institution-to-institution partnerships and peer relationships which help in broadening the scope of the educational program by providing opportunities for enhanced learning and an affordable access to the students aspiring to pursue higher studies with a global exposure NIET is one of the few institutes in India who are offering this kind of program. Key Highlights 01 Global exposure and experience 02 Access to partner university engagement programs 03 Government recognized program valid all over the world 04 Opportunities for self development and networking 05 Affordable education with maximum learning

overview: B.Tech-Computer Science & Engineering
uploads/course/66570f8e6cf861716981646.webp

The Department of Computer Science and Engineering at NIET is known for its excellence in computer engineering education with highest package and 100% placement record. With a strong tradition of producing high-quality professionals and a significant presence in the software industry both in India and abroad, department has established itself as a leader in the field. The department is at the forefront of cutting-edge research and the delivery of state-of-the-art education. Department was established in the year of 2001, with the capacity of 60 which increased to 240 intake. --> The Department of Computer Science and Engineering at NIET is known for its excellence in computer engineering education with the highest package and 100% placement record. As one of the leading B Tech CSE colleges in Delhi NCR, the department has a strong tradition of producing producing high-quality professionals and a significant presence in the software industry both in India and abroad, department has established itself as a leader in the field. The department is at the forefront of cutting-edge research and the delivery of state-of-the-art education. Department was established in the year 2001, with the capacity of 60 which increased to 360 intake. The department has the twinning program with International Universities. NIET has a rich tradition of producing top-notch professionals in the field of computer science and engineering. This tradition has solidified the department's standing as a significant player in the software industry like Microsoft, AWS, Capgemini. The department consistently attracts the brightest students and faculty members, fostering an academic community that values innovation and knowledge sharing. The department is renowned for its pioneering research efforts. Faculty members are leaders in advanced computer technologies such as genetic algorithms, machine learning, data mining, computer graphics, software engineering, cloud computing, Security and network programming. This commitment to cutting-edge research ensures that students receive a well-rounded education that is both current and relevant. With a strong tradition of producing high-quality professionals and a significant presence in the software industry both in India and abroad, department has established itself as a leader in the field. Department was established in the year of 2001, with the capacity of 60 which increased to 240 intake. --> The Department of Computer Science and Engineering at NIET is known for its excellence in computer engineering education with the highest package and 100% placement record. As one of the leading B Tech CSE colleges in Delhi NCR, the department has a strong tradition of producing producing high-quality professionals and a significant presence in the software industry both in India and abroad, department has established itself as a leader in the field. The department is at the forefront of cutting-edge research and the delivery of state-of-the-art education. Department was established in the year 2001, with the capacity of 60 which increased to 360 intake. The department has the twinning program with International Universities. NIET has a rich tradition of producing top-notch professionals in the field of computer science and engineering. This tradition has solidified the department's standing as a significant player in the software industry like Microsoft, AWS, Capgemini. The department consistently attracts the brightest students and faculty members, fostering an academic community that values innovation and knowledge sharing. The department is renowned for its pioneering research efforts. Faculty members are leaders in advanced computer technologies such as genetic algorithms, machine learning, data mining, computer graphics, software engineering, cloud computing, Security and network programming. This commitment to cutting-edge research ensures that students receive a well-rounded education that is both current and relevant. PEO1: To have an excellent scientific and engineering breadth so as to comprehend, analyze, design and provide sustainable solutions for real-life problems using state-of-the-art technologies. PEO2: To have a successful career in industries, to pursue higher studies or to support entrepreneurial endeavors and to face the global challenges. PEO3: To have an effective communication skills, professional attitude, ethical values and a desire to learn specific knowledge in emerging trends, technologies for research, innovation and product development and contribution to society. PEO4: To have life-long learning for up-skilling and re-skilling for a successful professional career as an engineer, scientist, entrepreneur or bureaucrat for the betterment of the society. Program Specific Outcomes (PSOs) Our students will be able to PSO1: Identify, analyze real world problems and design their ethical solutions using artificial intelligence, robotics, virtual/augmented reality, data analytics, block chain technology, and cloud computing. PSO2: Design and develop the hardware sensor devices and related interfacing software systems for solving complex engineering problems. PSO3: Understand inter-disciplinary computing techniques and to apply them in the design of advanced computing. PSO4: Conduct investigation of complex problems with the help of technical, managerial, leadership qualities, and modern engineering tools provided by industry-sponsored laboratories.

Make your Academic Journey Truly International! NIET offers an AICTE approved International Twinning program for the students. The program is based on institution-to-institution partnerships and peer relationships which help in broadening the scope of the educational program by providing opportunities for enhanced learning and an affordable access to the students aspiring to pursue higher studies with a global exposure. NIET is one of the few institutes in India who are offering this kind of program. Global exposure and experience Access to partner university engagement programs Government recognized program valid all over the world Opportunities for self development and networking Affordable education with maximum learning

Accommodation Choosing a global degree opens up a world of new ideas, promotes intellectual growth, gives a taste of diverse culture and social activities, new adventures and the building of lifelong friendships for the students. Lets take a sneak peek into what is in store for you at the partner universities. Living In Malaysia Malaysia is a country with a diverse culture and geography. It gives an ample opportunity to explore and discover pristine island beaches, peaceful villages, cool highlands and lush jungle ecosystems. A major advantage for international students who choose to study in Malaysia is the relatively reasonable cost of living. The total expenditure for accommodation, either on-campus or off-campus is very affordable. Life@Asia Pacific University, Malaysia Explore More Life@Management and Science University Explore More Living in Singapore Life@James Cook University What makes Singapore a haven for international students is the great weather, top-rated universities, safe and clear environment, English-speaking population, and a flourishing economy. This will truly excite you to visit Singapore for a rewarding career. There are a variety of accommodation types in Singapore to suit different budgeting needs. James Cook University Singapore assists you in finding suitable accommodation with one of their appointed accommodation providers. Explore More Living in UAE Life@Ajman University Ajman is located in the middle of the Emirates as a whole. It borders Sharjah and is only 10 km away from Dubai in the south. With more than 200 nationalities nesting in the UAE, youre sure to find your place here. But moving to a new city, especially in a new country, may not be easy. So let us help you to be more prepared for an easy transition. The best place to live is the varsity campus which is not only secure, but high-tech and attractive too. Explore More

overview: M.Tech-Computer Science & Engineering
uploads/course/65eaa8f8316461709877496.webp

An Autonomous Institute Noida Institute of Engineering & Technology offers the PG Course M. Tech (CSE) for students with a B. Tech degree in Computer Science and Engineering /Computer Science/ Information Technology and related branches. As a leading M.Tech in Computer Science colleges, the course is offered by the Department of Computer Science & Engineering by highly qualified and experienced faculty members. The intake of this course is 24. The course offers core courses such as Advanced Data Structures and Algorithms, Artificial Intelligence, Research Process and Methodology, High Performance Computing, Robotic Process Automation with seminar, pre-dissertation and dissertation. Among the top MTech colleges in Greater Noida, the curriculum is based on the needs of the industry. However, at our institution, we provide additional resources to bridge the gap between the academia and the industry. The objectives of this program are to build a technological base in computer science and engineering technologies, to analyze, design, develop and evaluate high-end computer systems, as well as to carry out challenging projects and carry out research activities. It also leads to identifying new trends and evaluating new technologies and working with faculty in different research fields on specialized and specific domains.

overview: uploads/course/65eab26a292351709879914.webp

A Master of Technology (M.Tech) in Mechanical Engineering is a postgraduate program offering a comprehensive study of advanced mechanical engineering principles and applications. The curriculum typically dedicated towards Industry 4.0, covering fundamental topics like materials science, alongside specialization tracks in areas such as manufacturing engineering, robotics, or renewable energy. Elective courses allow students to tailor their studies to their interests, while a significant research component, including thesis or dissertation work, provides hands-on experience and fosters innovation. Practical training, lab work, seminars, and workshops supplement theoretical learning, cultivating essential soft skills like communication and project management. Graduates emerge well-prepared for careers in industry, research, academia, or entrepreneurship, equipped with a deep understanding of mechanical engineering and practical skills to tackle complex engineering challenges. Honours Degree Using MOOCs Platform Coursera/Infosys Springboard Industry Certifications

overview: Masters Business Administration (International Twinning Program)
international-twinning-program#mba

NIET offers an AICTE approved International Twinning program for the students. The program is based on institution-to-institution partnerships and peer relationships which help in broadening the scope of the educational program by providing opportunities for enhanced learning and an affordable access to the students aspiring to pursue higher studies with a global exposure NIET is one of the few institutes in India who are offering this kind of program. Key Highlights 01 Global exposure and experience 02 Access to partner university engagement programs 03 Government recognized program valid all over the world 04 Opportunities for self development and networking 05 Affordable education with maximum learning

PEO1: To have an excellent scientific and engineering breadth so as to comprehend, analyze, design and provide sustainable solutions for real-life problems using state-of-the-art technologies. PEO2: To have a successful career in industries, to pursue higher studies or to support entrepreneurial endeavors and to face the global challenges. PEO3: To have an effective communication skills, professional attitude, ethical values and a desire to learn specific knowledge in emerging trends, technologies for research, innovation and product development and contribution to society. PEO4: To have life-long learning for up-skilling and re-skilling for a successful professional career as an engineer, scientist, entrepreneur or bureaucrat for the betterment of the society. Program Specific Outcomes (PSOs) Our students will be able to PSO1: Identify, analyze real world problems and design their ethical solutions using artificial intelligence, robotics, virtual/augmented reality, data analytics, block chain technology, and cloud computing. PSO2: Design and develop the hardware sensor devices and related interfacing software systems for solving complex engineering problems. PSO3: Understand inter-disciplinary computing techniques and to apply them in the design of advanced computing. PSO4: Conduct investigation of complex problems with the help of technical, managerial, leadership qualities, and modern engineering tools provided by industry-sponsored laboratories.

Accommodation Choosing a global degree opens up a world of new ideas, promotes intellectual growth, gives a taste of diverse culture and social activities, new adventures and the building of lifelong friendships for the students. Lets take a sneak peek into what is in store for you at the partner universities. Living In Malaysia Malaysia is a country with a diverse culture and geography. It gives an ample opportunity to explore and discover pristine island beaches, peaceful villages, cool highlands and lush jungle ecosystems. A major advantage for international students who choose to study in Malaysia is the relatively reasonable cost of living. The total expenditure for accommodation, either on-campus or off-campus is very affordable. Life@Asia Pacific University, Malaysia Explore More Life@Management and Science University Explore More Living in Singapore Life@James Cook University What makes Singapore a haven for international students is the great weather, top-rated universities, safe and clear environment, English-speaking population, and a flourishing economy. This will truly excite you to visit Singapore for a rewarding career. There are a variety of accommodation types in Singapore to suit different budgeting needs. James Cook University Singapore assists you in finding suitable accommodation with one of their appointed accommodation providers. Explore More Living in UAE Life@Ajman University Ajman is located in the middle of the Emirates as a whole. It borders Sharjah and is only 10 km away from Dubai in the south. With more than 200 nationalities nesting in the UAE, youre sure to find your place here. But moving to a new city, especially in a new country, may not be easy. So let us help you to be more prepared for an easy transition. The best place to live is the varsity campus which is not only secure, but high-tech and attractive too. Explore More
